Chapter 16, Part 5: Praising MahÄyÄna in the First Part
Past giving pÄramitÄ is empty of past giving pÄramitÄ, future giving pÄramitÄ is empty of future giving pÄramitÄ, present giving pÄramitÄ is empty of present giving pÄramitÄ;

Past morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom are empty of past morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom. Future morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom are empty of future morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom. Present morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom are empty of present morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom.
In emptiness, the perfection of giving of the past cannot be apprehended.

Because the perfection of giving of the past is itself empty, and the nature of emptiness is also empty. In emptiness, emptiness itself cannot be apprehended, let alone the perfection of giving of the past being apprehended in emptiness!
In emptiness, the future perfection of generosity cannot be apprehended.

Because the future perfection of generosity is itself empty, and the nature of emptiness is also empty. In emptiness, emptiness itself cannot be apprehended, let alone the future perfection of generosity that can be apprehended in emptiness.
In emptiness, the present perfection of generosity cannot be apprehended.

Because the present perfection of generosity is itself empty, and the nature of emptiness is also empty. In emptiness, emptiness itself cannot be apprehended, let alone the present perfection of generosity that can be apprehended in emptiness.
The past, future, and present perfection of generosity cannot be apprehended.

Past, future, and present perfection of generosity is itself empty, and the nature of emptiness is also empty. Emptiness within emptiness cannot be apprehended, let alone past, future, and present perfection of generosity that might be apprehended within emptiness.
In emptiness, past morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom cannot be apprehended.

Past morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom are themselves empty, and the nature of emptiness is also empty. Emptiness within emptiness cannot be apprehended, let alone past morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom that might be apprehended within emptiness.
In emptiness, future morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom cannot be apprehended.

future morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom are emptiness, and the nature of emptiness is also empty. Emptiness within emptiness cannot be apprehended, let alone the existence of future morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom within emptiness.
In emptiness, present morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom cannot be apprehended.

Present morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom are emptiness, and the nature of emptiness is also empty. Emptiness within emptiness cannot be apprehended, let alone the existence of present morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom within emptiness.
past, future, and present morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom cannot be found in emptiness.

Past, future, and present morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom are themselves empty, and the nature of emptiness is also empty. Emptiness within emptiness cannot even be found, let alone past, future, and present morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom being found within emptiness.

The past four meditations are empty of the past four meditations, the future four meditations are empty of the future four meditations, and the present four meditations are empty of the present four meditations;

The past four immeasurables and four formless concentrations are empty of the past four immeasurables and four formless concentrations. The future four immeasurables and four formless concentrations are empty of the future four immeasurables and four formless concentrations. The present four immeasurables and four formless concentrations are empty of the present four immeasurables and four formless concentrations.
In emptiness, the past four meditations cannot be apprehended.

Because the past four meditations are themselves empty, and the nature of emptiness is also empty. In emptiness, emptiness itself cannot be apprehended, let alone the past four meditations being apprehended in emptiness.
In emptiness, the future four meditations cannot be apprehended.

Because the future four meditations are themselves empty, and the nature of emptiness is also empty. In emptiness, emptiness itself cannot be apprehended, let alone the future four meditations being apprehended in emptiness.
The four present meditations are unobtainable in emptiness.

The four present meditations are themselves empty, and the nature of emptiness is also empty. Emptiness within emptiness is unobtainable, let alone the four present meditations that can be obtained within emptiness.
The four past, future, and present meditations are unobtainable in emptiness.

Emptiness within emptiness cannot even be apprehended, let alone the four immeasurables and four formless concentrations of the past, future, and present being apprehended within emptiness.

The four establishments of mindfulness of the past are empty of the four establishments of mindfulness of the past, the four establishments of mindfulness of the future are empty of the four establishments of mindfulness of the future, and the four establishments of mindfulness of the present are empty of the four establishments of mindfulness of the present;

The past four right efforts, four legs of supernatural power, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of awakening, and eightfold noble path are empty of the past four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path. The future four right efforts, four legs of supernatural power, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of awakening, and eightfold noble path are empty of the future four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path. The present four right efforts, four legs of supernatural power, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of awakening, and eightfold noble path are empty of the present four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path.

The four establishments of mindfulness of the future are empty, the nature of emptiness is also empty, emptiness within emptiness is unobtainable, let alone the four establishments of mindfulness of the future that can be obtained within emptiness!
The four establishments of mindfulness of the present cannot be obtained within emptiness.

The four establishments of mindfulness of the present are empty, the nature of emptiness is also empty, emptiness within emptiness is unobtainable, let alone the four establishments of mindfulness of the present that can be obtained within emptiness!
The four establishments of mindfulness of the past, future, and present cannot be obtained within emptiness.

The four establishments of mindfulness of the past, future, and present are empty, the nature of emptiness is also empty, emptiness within emptiness is unobtainable, let alone the four establishments of mindfulness of the past, future, and present that can be obtained within emptiness!

The four right efforts, four bases of supernatural power, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of awakening, and eightfold noble path of the future cannot be apprehended within emptiness.

The past emptiness gateway is empty of the past emptiness gateway, the future emptiness gateway is empty of the future emptiness gateway, and the present emptiness gateway is empty of the present emptiness gateway;

The past signless and wishless doors of liberation are empty of the past signless and wishless doors of liberation, the future signless and wishless doors of liberation are empty of the future signless and wishless doors of liberation, and the present signless and wishless doors of liberation are empty of the present signless and wishless doors of liberation.
In emptiness, the past door of liberation of emptiness is unobtainable.

In emptiness, the future door of liberation of emptiness is unobtainable.

Because the future door of liberation of emptiness is itself emptiness, and the nature of emptiness is also empty. In emptiness, emptiness is unobtainable, let alone the future door of liberation of emptiness that can be obtained in emptiness.
The present emptiness of the emptiness liberation door is unobtainable.

The future signless and wishless doors of liberation cannot be apprehended within emptiness.

The five eyes in the past are empty of the five eyes in the past, the five eyes in the future are empty of the five eyes in the future, and the five eyes in the present are empty of the five eyes in the present;

Because the self, sentient beings, up to the knower and the seer cannot be apprehended.
Past form is unobtainable, future form is unobtainable, present form is unobtainable, and form in the equality of the three times is also unobtainable.
In the equality, past, future, and present form are all unobtainable.
In equality, the nature of equality itself is unobtainable, let alone obtaining past, future, or present form in equality.

Past feeling, perception, volition, and consciousness are unobtainable, future feeling, perception, volition, and consciousness are unobtainable, present feeling, perception, volition, and consciousness are unobtainable, and feeling, perception, volition, and consciousness in the equality of the three times are also unobtainable.
In the equality, past, future, and present feeling, perception, volition, and consciousness are all unobtainable.
The nature of equality within equality is also unobtainable, let alone the past, future, and present feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness that can be obtained within equality.

The past eye sense base is unobtainable, the future eye sense base is unobtainable, the present eye sense base is unobtainable, and the eye sense base within the equality of the three times is also unobtainable.
Within equality, the past, future, and present eye sense bases are all unobtainable.
The nature of equality within equality is also unobtainable, let alone the past, future, and present eye sense base that can be obtained within equality.

The ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind bases of the past are unobtainable, the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind bases of the future are unobtainable, the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind bases of the present are unobtainable, and in the equality of the three times, the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind bases are also unobtainable.

In equality, the nature of equality itself is unobtainable, let alone in equality, the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind bases of the past, future, and present that can be obtained!

The form base of the past is unobtainable, the form base of the future is unobtainable, the form base of the present is unobtainable, and in the equality of the three times, the form base is also unobtainable.
In equality, past, future, and present form are all unobtainable.
In equality, even the nature of equality is unobtainable, let alone the obtainability of past, future, and present form within equality.

The past sense bases of sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas are unobtainable, the future sense bases of sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas are unobtainable, the present sense bases of sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas are unobtainable, and even in the equality of the three times, the sense bases of sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas are unobtainable.
In equality, past, future, and present sense bases of sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas are all unobtainable.
The nature of equality within equality is also unobtainable, let alone the past, future, and present faculties of sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharmas that can be obtained within equality!

The past limit of the eye element is unobtainable, the future limit of the eye element is unobtainable, the present limit of the eye element is unobtainable, and within the equality of the three times, the eye element is also unobtainable.
Within equality, the past, future, and present eye elements are all unobtainable.
Within equality, the nature of equality is also unobtainable, let alone the past, future, and present eye elements that can be obtained within equality!

In the equality, past, future, and present ear-elements are all unobtainable.
In equality, the nature of equality itself is unobtainable, let alone in equality, past, future, and present ear-elements can be obtained!

The sound element, ear consciousness element, and ear contact and the feelings that arise from ear contact in the past are unobtainable, those in the future are unobtainable, and those in the present are unobtainable. In the equality of the three times, the sound element, ear consciousness element, and ear contact and the feelings that arise from ear contact in the past, future, and present are all unobtainable.

In equality, the nature of equality itself is unobtainable, let alone the sound element, ear consciousness element, and ear contact and the feelings that arise from ear contact in the past, future, and present within equality.

The nose-element of the past is unobtainable, the nose-element of the future is unobtainable, the nose-element of the present is unobtainable, and the nose-element in the equality of the three times is also unobtainable.
In the equality of the three times, the nose-element of the past, future, and present is unobtainable.
In equality, the nature of equality itself is unobtainable, let alone the nose-element of the past, future, or present within equality being obtainable!
